devdoc.details: The FAST Access Smart Contract is the source of truth when it comes to permissioning and ACLs within a given FAST network.

addGovernor(address).details: Adds a governor to the governor list.

addMember(address).details: Adds a member to the membership list.

flags(address).details: Retrieves flags for a given address.

governorCount().details: Queries the number of governors in the governor list.

isGovernor(address).details: Queries whether a given address is a governor or not.

isMember(address).details: Queries whether a given address is a member or not.

memberCount().details: Queries the number of members in the membership list.

removeGovernor(address).details: Removes a governor from the governor list.

removeMember(address).details: Removes a member from the membership list.
